summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.3°C) and outside temperature (down 8.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles), cloud levels (up 397 m), and outside humidity (down 12%) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 32.1m higher than yesterday, 396.6m lower than past week, 378.6m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 356m to a maximum of 641m, averaging 510.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 907.3m and 889.3m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and light winds will prevail. Chance of light rain, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
